verses.verse: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> miz-Bach the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah of burnt offering עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <WH2568> cha-Mesh five אַמּ֨וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits אָרְכּ֜וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko [was] the length וְחָֽמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> ve-cha-mesh- thereof and five אַמּ֤וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits רָחְבּוֹ֙ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo the breadth רָב֔וּעַ <WH7251> ra-Vu-a', thereof [it was] foursquare וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> ve-sha-Losh and three אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> am-Mot cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> ko-ma-To. the height

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <WH7161> kar-no-Tav, the horns עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' thereof on the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <WH6438> pin-no-Tav, corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu at הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu being קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <WH7161> kar-no-Tav; of it the horns וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf thereof were of the same and he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet. it with brass

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> ke-Lei all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַסִּירֹ֤ת <WH5518> has-si-Rot the pots וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיָּעִים֙ <WH3257> hai-ya-'Im and the shovels וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <WH4219> ham-miz-ra-Kot, and the basons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת <WH4207> ham-miz-la-Got [and] the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת <WH4289> ham-mach-Tot; and the firepans כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> ke-Lav all the vessels עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah thereof made נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet. he [of] brass

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> lam-miz-Be-ach for the altar מִכְבָּ֔ר <WH4345> mich-Bar, grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh act רֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7568> Re-shet network נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet; a brasen תַּ֧חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat beneath כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ <WH3749> kar-kub-Bo under the compass מִלְּמַ֖טָּה <WH4295> mil-le-Mat-tah thereof beneath עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- reaching חֶצְיֽוֹ׃ <WH2677> chetz-Yo. unto the midst

וַיִּצֹ֞ק <WH3332> vai-yi-Tzok And he cast אַרְבַּ֧ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four טַבָּעֹ֛ת <WH2885> tab-ba-'Ot rings בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> be-'ar-Ba' for the four הַקְּצָוֹ֖ת <WH7099> hak-ke-tza-Vot ends לְמִכְבַּ֣ר <WH4345> le-mich-Bar of the grate הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> han-ne-Cho-shet; of brass בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> bat-Tim [to be] places לַבַּדִּֽים׃ <WH905> lab-bad-Dim. for the staves

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֖ים <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <WH6823> vay-Tzaf and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet. them with brass

וַיָּבֵ֨א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּ֜ים <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> bat-tab-ba-'Ot, into the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> tzal-'Ot on the sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> la-Set to bear אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; נְב֥וּב <WH5014> ne-Vuv the altar hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <WH3871> lu-Chot with boards עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah it withal he made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> o-To. ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as, And he made אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הַכִּיּ֣וֹר <WH3595> hak-ki-Yor the laver נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet, [of] brass וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et כַּנּ֣וֹ <WH3653> kan-No and the foot נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet; of it [of] brass בְּמַרְאֹת֙ <WH4759> be-mar-'Ot of the lookingglasses הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת <WH6633> hatz-Tzoe-'Ot, of [the women] assembling אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who צָֽבְא֔וּ <WH6633> tza-ve-'U, which assembled פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer; the court לִפְאַ֣ת׀ <WH6285> lif-'At side נֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev on the south תֵּימָ֗נָה <WH8486> tei-Ma-nah, southward קַלְעֵ֤י <WH7050> kal-'Ei the hangings הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer of the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֔ר <WH7806> ma-she-Zar, [were of] fine twined מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> ba-'am-Mah. cubits

עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> 'am-mu-dei-Hem Their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim, [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet; and their brasen וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> va-Vei the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. [were of] silver

וְלִפְאַ֤ת <WH6285> ve-lif-'At side צָפוֹן֙ <WH6828> tza-fOn And for the north מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> me-'Ah [the hangings were] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> va-'am-Mah, cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim, [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet; of brass וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> va-Vei the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים <WH5982> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. [of] silver

וְלִפְאַת־ <WH6285> ve-lif-'at- side יָ֗ם <WH3220> Yam, And for the west קְלָעִים֙ <WH7050> ke-la-'Im [were] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim of fifty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> ba-'am-Mah, cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5982> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah, ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah; ten וָוֵ֧י <WH2053> va-Vei the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <WH5982> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. [of] silver
וְלִפְאַ֛ת <WH6285> ve-lif-'At side קֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> Ke-de-mah And for the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <WH4217> miz-Ra-chah eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> 'am-Mah. cubits

קְלָעִ֛ים <WH7050> ke-la-'Im The hangings חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> cha-mesh- fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַכָּתֵ֑ף <WH3802> hak-ka-Tef; of the one side עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah, three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> she-lo-Shah. three

וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף <WH3802> ve-lak-ka-Tef side הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit, And for the other מִזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh he וּמִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> u-miz-Zeh he לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> le-Sha-'ar gate הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer, of the court קְלָעִ֕ים <WH7050> ke-la-'Im on this hand and that hand [were] hangings חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> 'am-Mah; cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5982> 'am-mu-dei-Hem their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah, three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> she-lo-Shah. three

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All קַלְעֵ֧י <WH7050> kal-'Ei All the hangings הֶחָצֵ֛ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer of the court סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> ma-she-Zar. [were] of fine twined

וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים <WH134> ve-ha-'a-da-Nim And the sockets לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ <WH5982> la-'am-mu-Dim for the pillars נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <WH5178> ne-cho-Shet [were of] brass וָוֵ֨י <WH2053> va-Vei the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים <WH5982> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ <WH2838> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef, [of] silver וְצִפּ֥וּי <WH6826> ve-tzip-Pui and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Hem of their chapiters כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> Ka-sef; [of] silver וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> ve-Hem like מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <WH2836> me-chush-sha-Kim [were] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef, with silver כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol and all עַמֻּדֵ֥י <WH5982> 'am-mu-Dei and all the pillars הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer. of the court

וּמָסַ֞ךְ <WH4539> u-ma-Sach And the hanging שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar for the gate הֶחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer of the court מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh was the work רֹקֵ֔ם <WH7551> ro-Kem, of the weaver תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <WH7806> ma-she-Zar; and fine twined וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech, [was] the length וְקוֹמָ֤ה <WH6967> ve-ko-Mah and the height בְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav in the breadth חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> am-Mot, cubits לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat answerable קַלְעֵ֥י <WH7050> kal-'Ei to the hangings הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer. of the court

וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <WH5982> ve-'am-mu-dei-Hem And their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah, [were] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH134> ve-'ad-nei-Hem and their sockets אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> 'ar-ba-'Ah four נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet; [of] brass וָוֵיהֶ֣ם <WH2053> va-vei-Hem their hooks כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef, [of] silver וְצִפּ֧וּי <WH6826> ve-tzip-Pui and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <WH7218> ra-shei-Hem of their chapiters וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <WH2838> va-cha-shu-kei-Hem and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> Ka-sef. [of] silver

וְֽכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol All הַיְתֵדֹ֞ת <WH3489> hay-te-Dot And all the pins לַמִּשְׁכָּ֧ן <WH4908> lam-mish-Kan of the tabernacle וְלֶחָצֵ֛ר <WH2691> ve-le-cha-Tzer and of the court סָבִ֖יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet. [were of] brass ס sa-Mek

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh This פְקוּדֵ֤י <WH6485> fe-ku-Dei is the sum הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan of the tabernacle מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <WH4908> mish-Kan [even] of the tabernacle הָעֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut, of testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher as they פֻּקַּ֖ד <WH6485> puk-Kad as it was counted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according פִּ֣י <WH6310> pi according to the commandment מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; of Moses עֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> 'a-vo-Dat [for] the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim, of the Levites בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand אִֽיתָמָ֔ר <WH385> 'i-ta-Mar, of Ithamar בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron to Aaron הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen. the priest

וּבְצַלְאֵ֛ל <WH1212> u-ve-tzal-'El And Bezaleel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אוּרִ֥י <WH221> 'u-Ri of Uri בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son ח֖וּר <WH2354> chur of Hur לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> le-mat-Teh of the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah עָשָׂ֕ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah made אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְאִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> ve-'it-To, With אָהֳלִיאָ֞ב <WH171> 'o-ho-li-'Av And with him [was] Aholiab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- son אֲחִיסָמָ֛ךְ <WH294> 'a-chi-sa-Mach of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <WH4294> le-mat-teh- of the tribe דָ֖ן <WH1835> dan of Dan חָרָ֣שׁ <WH2796> cha-Rash an engraver וְחֹשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> ve-cho-Shev; and a cunning workman וְרֹקֵ֗ם <WH7551> ve-ro-Kem, and an embroiderer בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <WH8504> bat-te-Che-let in blue וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <WH713> u-va-'ar-ga-Man, and in purple וּבְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> u-ve-to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> hash-sha-Ni scarlet וּבַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8336> u-vash-Shesh. and fine linen ס sa-Mek
